participant_1.name: Tom
participant_1.personality: Supportive and laid-back, enjoys team activities and family time.
participant_1.background: i coach little league baseball. i also like a glass of wine in the evenings. i drive a mini van. i have five sons. coffee is my preferred beverage.

participant_2.name: Lisa
participant_2.personality: Confident and enthusiastic, with a love for sports and unique collections.
participant_2.background: i won a gold medal in the 1992 olympics. i have a hat collection of over 1000 hats. my favorite season is winter. i've a weakness for vanilla ice cream. i love cats and have two cats.

content.text: Did you know that i won a gold medal in the 1992 olympics.Do you have any medals?
